info.name: Experimental Spells
info.description: Experimental spells from The Book of Xellarant.
info.author: Xellarant

description.p: A melee weapon you are holding (or the flesh of a chosen creature) is suffused with an iron alloy and briefly transformed into magical steel. For the duration, the weapon (or the creature's flesh) emits a dull glow as its chemical structure is temporarily altered. The weapon (or the creature's unarmed strike) becomes magical and deals an additional 1d4 damage of its type on a successful hit. The spell ends after 1 minute, if you cast it again, or earlier if you make a successul attack with or let go of the weapon effected. A creature under the effects of this spell may choose not to apply the additional damage for unarmed strikes.
The spellâ€™s damage increases by 1d4 when you reach 5th level (2d4), 11th level (3d4), and 17th level (4d4).
